brands.name: Stella & Chewy's
brands.description: Premium freeze-dried raw pet food made with responsibly sourced proteins
brands.mission: To provide pets with the nutrition they deserve through minimally processed, raw food

brands.name: Open Farm
brands.description: Humanely raised proteins with certified non-GMO ingredients
brands.mission: Transparency in every ingredient, sustainability in every decision

brands.name: Primal Pet Foods
brands.description: Raw, organic, and freeze-dried nutrition for pets
brands.mission: Revolutionizing pet nutrition with raw, whole food ingredients

brands.name: The Honest Kitchen
brands.description: Human-grade dehydrated pet food and treats
brands.mission: Real food made with love for the health and happiness of pets

brands.name: Bocce's Bakery
brands.description: All-natural, wheat-free dog treats baked in small batches
brands.mission: Baking simple, wholesome treats that dogs and their humans can feel good about

brands.name: Icelandic+
brands.description: 100% natural, sustainable fish-based treats from Iceland
brands.mission: Sustainably sourced Icelandic treats that honor the earth and nourish pets

brands.name: Barkworthies
brands.mission: Providing dogs with healthy, natural chews that support their wellbeing

brands.name: Zesty Paws
brands.mission: Creating functional supplements that help pets live their zestiest lives

products.name: Stella's Super Beef Dinner Patties
products.description: 95% grass-fed beef, organs and bone, with 5% organic certified fruits and vegetables. Raw, freeze-dried nutrition in convenient patty form.

products.name: Chewy's Chicken Dinner Patties
products.description: Made with cage-free chicken, organic fruits and vegetables. Complete and balanced raw freeze-dried nutrition.

products.name: Grass-Fed Beef Freeze-Dried Treats
products.description: Single ingredient, humanely raised beef. Perfect for training or as a high-value reward.

products.name: Wild-Caught Salmon Freeze-Dried Treats
products.description: 100% wild-caught salmon, sustainably sourced. Rich in Omega-3 fatty acids.

products.name: Raw Freeze-Dried Canine Chicken Formula
products.description: Certified organic produce, antibiotic and hormone-free chicken. Complete raw nutrition.

products.name: Turkey & Sardine Formula Nuggets
products.description: Free-range turkey with wild-caught sardines. Packed with protein and omega-3s.

products.name: Dehydrated Whole Grain Chicken Recipe
products.description: Human-grade ingredients including cage-free chicken, organic barley, and eggs. Just add water.

products.name: Grain-Free Turkey Recipe
products.description: Dehydrated turkey with organic vegetables. Perfect for sensitive stomachs.

products.name: Soft & Chewy Peanut Butter Treats
products.description: All-natural, wheat-free treats made with real peanut butter. Perfect for training.

products.name: Birthday Cake Biscuits
products.description: Special celebration treats with peanut butter, carob, and vanilla. Wheat-free recipe.

products.name: Cod Skin Strips
products.description: 100% pure Icelandic cod skin. Single ingredient, naturally rich in Omega-3s.

products.name: Capelin Whole Fish Treats
products.description: Sustainably caught whole capelin fish from Iceland. Crunchy texture dogs love.

products.name: Beef Collagen Sticks
products.description: Natural beef collagen chews. Supports joint health and dental hygiene.

products.name: Sweet Potato Fries
products.description: Single ingredient sweet potato treats. Naturally sweet and packed with vitamins.

products.name: Omega Bites for Dogs
products.description: Fish oil soft chews with EPA & DHA for skin, coat, and joint support.

products.name: Lamb Meal Mixers
products.description: 100% grass-fed lamb in freeze-dried form. Perfect meal topper to boost nutrition.

products.name: Pasture-Raised Pork Treats
products.description: Humanely raised pork from certified farms. Single ingredient, freeze-dried.

products.name: Crunchy Apple Pie Biscuits
products.description: Made with real apples and cinnamon. Wheat-free, all-natural ingredients.

products.name: Redfish Skin Rolls
products.description: Ocean-caught redfish skin, rolled for extended chewing. Rich in collagen.

products.name: Calming Bites
products.description: Soft chews with melatonin, chamomile, and L-theanine for anxious dogs.
